question: What is Giorgos Seferis famous for?
explanation: Giorgos Seferis, the pen name of Georgios Seferiades, was a Greek poet-diplomat. He was one of the most important Greek poets of the 20th century and a Nobel laureate. He was a career diplomat in the Greek Foreign Service, culminating in his appointment as Ambassador to the UK, a post which he held from 1957 to 1962. His literary movement involved modernism and was part of the Generation of the '30s.
